metadata.title: CVE-2017-16820 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The csnmp_read_table function in snmp.c in the SNMP plugin in collectdbefore 5.6.3 is susceptible to a double free in a certain error case, whichcould lead to a crash (or potentially have other impact).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16820` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

collectd - 5.7.2-2ubuntu1
collectd-core - 5.7.2-2ubuntu1
collectd-utils - 5.7.2-2ubuntu1
libcollectdclient1 - 5.7.2-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: collectd package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.2-2ubuntu1').
